description:
Eli the Computer Guy brings his YouTube Channel to Udemy!!!

https://www.youtube.com/user/elithecomputerguy

Whether you want to know how to fix your Laptop Computer, or create a Web Marketing Campaign for your company Eli the Computer Guy has a class for you!  Eli teaches you more then the technology.  He explains why you use technologogy and how to sell it to clients, your boss, or the man in the mirror.

If you wish to watch the videos online for free please view them at the YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/elithecomputerguy

This Udemy Course is mainly for people who want to download the classes to view them offline, and use Udemy's extended functionality.
title: Eli the Computer Guy Collection
